title: Pop Babylon
description: How do you make it as a pop star? Packed with scandal and intrigue, Pop Babylon takes you to the dark heart of one of the world’s most wicked and secretive industries. Tracking a year in the making of a brand new boy band, Pop Babylon is pure, unadulterated reading pleasure. Disgraceful, revelatory and great down-and-dirty fun, it’s essential reading for anyone who wants to know what it really takes nowadays to be top of the pops.
author: Imogen Edwards-Jones
